column4: ok, I have a laptop with an ATI 9100 IGP chip in it.  Works good with the OS driver...
but it won't do dual monitors. The proprietary driver will do it (or at least it did in Edgy. Problem is the latest driver for my chip doesn't support the latest version of Xorg (that's in Feisty).
All that I've read about the problem seems to indicate that the only way to get the driver in is to DOWN grade the Xorg to <7.1. Have you heard anything different?
it also won't work with feisty's kernel
